hopobject.name: UPnP_AV_MediaServer
hopobject.pname: UPnP/DLNA AV client renderer and transcoding server
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.0.11) Gecko/2009060215 Firefox/3.0.11
hopobject.body:
Work will be based upon vlc+djmount (for client side) and fuppes (for server side). Server side transcoding to be hardware assisted via hardware DSP codecs.
Initial target for the transcoding server on beagleboard is to drive the Neuros OSD (an underpowered DM320-based device).
hopobject.shortdesc: Enable the beagleboard as a fully featured UPnP AV rendering client, and as a UPnP AV (transcoding!) server.
